description:
In Viviter's multiplayer mode, you can play "Chickempic" with up to 8 players, and we're adding the "Full Throttle" mini-game!
I'll show you what real courage is all about!
I'll ride this bike right up to the nose of our sleeping boss.
If I make him mad, it's all over. But if I chicken out and don't go all the way, my reputation will be ruined.
name: Additional mini-game "Full Throttle"
